member.name: T:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar
member.summary: Represents a player's avatar.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.AvatarFront
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit vector pointing out of the avatars eyes.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.AvatarPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the avatar.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.AvatarTop
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit vector pointing out of the top of the avatars head.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.CameraFront
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit vector pointing out of the camera.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.CameraPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the camera.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.Context
member.summary: Gets or sets the avatar's context.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.Identity
member.summary: Gets or sets the avatar's identity.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.UiTick
member.summary: Gets or sets a numeric value that is used for change tracking.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Avatar.UiVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the UI version.

member.name: T:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext
member.summary: Provides contextual data about a player's avatar. Check the of two different players for equality to determine if the players are in the same map instance.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.BuildId
member.summary: Gets or sets the game client's build identifier.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.Instance
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance identifier of the current instance.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.MapId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the current map.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.MapType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the current map.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.ServerAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the server to which the game client is currently connected.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.ShardId
member.summary: Gets or sets the shard identifier of the current shard.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.AvatarContext.SetInnerContext(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the object that is used to compare the current object to another object of the same type.
member.param: The context that is used in comparisons.

member.name: T:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity
member.summary: Provides contextual information about a player's avatar.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.Commander
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the avatar is commanding a squad.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.Map
member.summary: Gets or sets the current map. This is a navigation property. Use the value of to obtain a reference.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.MapId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the current map.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the avatar.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.Profession
member.summary: Gets or sets the avatar's profession.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.Race
member.summary: Gets or sets the avatar's race.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.TeamColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the current team color. This is a navigation property. Use the value of to obtain a reference.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.TeamColorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the current team color.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.World
member.summary: Gets or sets the current world. This is a navigation property. Use the value of to obtain a reference.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.WorldId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the current world.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.FieldOfView
member.summary: Gets or sets the in-game camera field of view value.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.Identity.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the Mumble Link protocol.

member.name: F:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.memoryMappedFile
member.summary: Holds a reference to the shared memory block.

member.name: F:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.size
member.summary: The size of the shared memory block.

member.name: F:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.disposed
member.summary: Indicates whether this object is disposed.

member.name: P:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.PreferredCapacity
member.summary: Gets the preferred size for the memory mapped file.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.CreateOrOpen
member.summary: Creates or opens a memory-mapped file for the MumbleLink protocol.
member.returns: An object that provides wrapper methods for the MumbleLink protocol.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.Read
member.summary: Retrieves positional audio data from the shared memory block as defined by the Mumble Link protocol.
member.returns: Positional audio data as an instance of the class.

member.name: M:GW2NET.MumbleLink.MumbleLinkFile.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
member.param: true if managed resources should be released.
